markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs=""
>
[Moonstone Diadem](/Equipment.aspx?ID=588)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn circlet

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This delicate and elegant diadem is woven of intricate silver wires set with three tear-shaped pearlescent moonstones. You gain a +1 item bonus to [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) checks.

<document level="2" id="action-370" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Moonstone Diadem
